00067                                               {
00068         double mindistsq = 0.5*0.5; // within 50 km
00069         Entry best = null;
00070         for (Entry e : entries){
00071             double dist_lat = e.location.getLat() - loc.getLat();
00072             double dist_lon = e.location.getLon() - loc.getLon();
00073             double dist_sq = dist_lat*dist_lat + dist_lon*dist_lon;
00074             if ( dist_sq < mindistsq ){
00075                 mindistsq = dist_sq;
00076                 best = e;
00077             }
00078         }
00079         return best;
00080     }
